column4: ----GREAT GAME, Highly Unoptimized and bugged ----Great Game if want to learn how Mining works in modern times , really cool mining machines and everything Very Buggy as my vehicle was halfway inside the wall and I had to drive it in order to go somewhere but in that state it wont even allowed me to get inside , lol This game is perfect except for the fact that its highly unoptimized  You will get crazy FPS drops The gameplay gets choppy when you are in the outside world , when you are inside the mine then its ok Rating - 7/10( GREAT GAME, Highly Unoptimized and bugged )
